title: Smartboard Not Calibrating
description: A professor reports that the smartboard in their classroom is not calibrated correctly, and the touch points are inaccurate.

tasks.description: Identify the professor and classroom number.
Guide the professor through the on-screen calibration process for the smartboard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions to recalibrate the board.

tasks.description: If self-calibration fails, create a ticket for a technician to investigate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a support ticket for an on-site visit.
